metadata.title: CVE-2012-5662 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: x3270 before 3.3.12ga12 does not verify that the server hostname matches adomain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) or subjectAltName field ofthe X.509 certificate, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoofSSL servers via an arbitrary valid certificate.

criterions.comment: ibm-3270 package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
